actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Chafee. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 203.
Subcommittee on Environmental Pollution. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 99-235.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill relating to the authorization of appropriations for certain components of the National Wildlife Refuge System.

summary.text: Amends the Act which established the Bon Secour National Wildlife Refuge, Alabama, to increase the authorization of appropriations, which shall remain available until expended. Amends the Act which established the Tensas River National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana, to make the authorization of appropriations, which shall remain available until expended. Amends the Act which established the Bogue Chitto National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana and Mississippi, to increase the authorization of appropriations, which shall remain available until expended. Amends the Act which established the Tinicum National Environmental Center, Pennsylvania, to make the authorization of appropriations available until expended.

titles.title: A bill relating to the authorization of appropriations for certain components of the National Wildlife Refuge System.
